scripts.deploy:studio: export `cat .env | egrep -v '#|^$' | xargs` && graph deploy --deploy-key ${DEPLOY_KEY} -l v1.0.10-uni --studio ${SLUG_STUDIO}-${NETWORK}
scripts.deploy:hosted: export `cat .env | egrep -v '#|^$' | xargs` && graph deploy --access-token ${ACCESS_TOKEN} --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ${USER_HOSTED}/${SLUG_HOSTED}-${NETWORK}-${ENV_HOSTED}
scripts.set:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:ropsten: mustache config/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/ropsten.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:rinkeby: mustache config/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/rinkeby.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:kovan: mustache config/kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/kovan.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:goerli: mustache config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/goerli.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:avaxmain: mustache config/avaxmain.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/avaxmain.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:avaxtest: mustache config/avaxtest.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/avaxtest.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:bscmain: mustache config/bscmain.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/bscmain.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:bsctest: mustache config/bsctest.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/bsctest.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:ftmmain: mustache config/ftmmain.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/ftmmain.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:ftmtest: mustache config/ftmtest.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/ftmtest.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:maticmain: mustache config/maticmain.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/maticmain.json ../.env .env
scripts.set:matictest: mustache config/matictest.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml && mustache config/matictest.json ../.env .env
